name: Intermatic IW700K Heavy-Duty Mechanical in-Wall Timer - 20 A Rating, 72 Trippers for 36 ON/Off Events - 3-Way Switch, Easy Installation, 3-Position Override
short_description: 72 TRIPPERS FOR MAXIMUM CONTROL - Provides 36 ON/OFF events per 24-hour period, allowing precise control over your electrical devices. The 72 trippers enable fine-tuned scheduling with 20-minute switching intervals, perfect for managing lighting, appliances, and other equipment efficiently.

CAPTIVE TRIPPERS - Features captive trippers with 20-minute switching intervals, ensuring reliable and consistent operation. The trippers are built into the timer, eliminating the risk of losing them and ensuring long-term reliability.

3-WAY SWITCH AVAILABLE - Equipped with a 3-way (SPDT) switch, offering flexible installation options and compatibility with various wiring setups. This allows the timer to be used in different configurations, enhancing its versatility for various applications.

3-POSITION OVERRIDE - Includes a 3-position ON/OFF/AUTO override, enabling continuous ON or OFF operation as well as automatic control. This feature provides convenience and flexibility, allowing you to override the timer settings when needed for uninterrupted power.

HEAVY-DUTY RATING & EASY INSTALLATION - Boasts a heavy-duty 20 A rating for robust performance, suitable for high-power devices. Designed for easy wiring and installation, the timer includes multiple wall plates to fit different decors and setups. Requires a neutral connection for proper operation, ensuring safety and reliability in your electrical system.
product_description: The IW700K by Intermatic is a mechanical in-wall timer that replaces a standard wall switch to provide automatic control of outdoor or indoor lighting, fans, pumps, office equipment and other types of loads. It features 36 ON/OFF events per 24-hour period and captive trippers that will never fall out. For use with single pole applications. ON/AUTO/OFF override provides continuous ON or OFF positions. Wall plate included. Reliable synchronous timer motor. IMPORTANT - this product can only be used where a neutral wire is available to operate the clock motor. If you are unsure of your home wiring please contact an electrician or Intermatic Technical Support for assistance. CSA certified. UL listed. #14 AWG color coded lead wires. Hot -Black; Switched - Red, Neutral - White. Resistive: 20A, 120 VAC. Motor: 1 HP, 120 VAC

name: T104M Mechanical Timer Switch Mechanism Only, Heavy-Duty Timer Switch for Pool Pumps, 120V 40A DPST, 24-Hour 12 ON/Off Cycles - for Lights, Water Heaters, Fans, HVAC Systems
short_description: Engineered for High-Power Motor Loads: As a premier T104M pool pump timer, this unit is specifically engineered to manage high-horsepower equipment. Compatible with 208-277V systems (ideally suited for standard 240V), it handles resistive loads up to 40A and boasts one of the highest horsepower ratings in its class. The Double-Pole, Single-Throw (DPST) switch provides safe, dual-circuit control for 240V applications, ensuring reliable management of pool pumps, large water heaters, and irrigation systems.

Flexible Scheduling with Intuitive Mechanical Operation: This T104 timer mechanism features a user-friendly 24-hour dial and 4 ON/OFF trippers, allowing for customizable scheduling of up to 12 cycles per day with a minimum 1-hour runtime. The dial is clearly marked in 15-minute intervals for precise programming.

Durability for High-Demand Use: This T104M for pool pump timer mechanism only is the robust heart of your control system. Built with industrial-grade materials, it features upgraded pin connections and copper motor windings for exceptional durability and motor reliability under heavy, frequent switching. Its all-mechanical design ensures long-term, stable operation, making it the perfect direct replacement for worn or failed timer mechanisms in demanding applications.

Easy Installation: Designed as a compact 240v timer mechanism only, Clearly labeled wiring diagrams and guides simplify installation (we recommend photographing your existing wiring first). Versatile beyond pools, it's ideal for residential, commercial, and industrial control of outdoor lighting, fans, signage, and more.(not replacement for pool pump timer T101 T101M T101R T103 T103R T103M T106 T106R T106M).

5. Supported by Experts: An enhanced iteration of the proven T104 series, this mechanism delivers steadfast automation control. As a purely mechanical timer mechanism only, periodic maintenance of bearings and gears is recommended for smooth operation and extended service life. Unsure about the model or have usage questions? Our dedicated support team is here to help and will respond to your inquiries within 12 hours.

short_description: AUTOMATE YOUR HOME/OFFICE: Allows you to turn on & off your A/C, water heaters, pumps, signs, lamps, fans & other appliances automatically during a 24 hr cycle & once programmed,will repeat daily.
SIMPLE TO USE: Place ON tripper tab to the desired ON time and OFF tripper tab to the desired OFF time. Rotate dial counter-clockwise until the correct time is indicated by arrow on nameplate.

CONVENIENT SCHEDULING AND FEATURES: The timer features multiple on/off setting and is designed with tripper tabs, allowing for a minimum ON time of 20-minutes with a minimum OFF setting of 75 minutes. Dial accommodates up to 12 pairs of on/off tabs.
COMPATIBILITY: The timer is compatible with incandescent, compact fluorescent and LED light bulbs. The 120 to 277 dual-voltage timer can replace all single voltage switches.

product_description: The TORK C530M spring wound timer allows users to set fans, HVAC, whirlpools, motors, pumps and other appliances to automatically turn off, helping to save energy and money. The easy-to-use, twist dial timer features easy wiring with no neutral required, ideal for retrofitting existing wall switches. This timer is designed to replace any standard single or multi-gang wall switch. The "2-in-1" switch configuration wiring can be used for SPDT and SPST. The operating temperature is 32 °F to 122 °F (o °C to 50 °C). The timer includes a metal aluminum wall plate with screw mounting, adding extra security for commercial applications. This timer is not to be used in precision timing applications such as with sun lamps and saunas where inaccurate timing could have dangerous consequences. TORK has been a pioneer in the mechanical time switch industry since 1922.

short_description: COMPATIBLE WITH LED AND CFL LIGHTS - This versatile timer is ideal for controlling both LED and CFL bulbs, making it a perfect choice for energy-efficient homes, offices, and commercial spaces looking to manage their lighting systems efficiently.

EXTENDED 12 HOUR OFF CONTROL - Designed to automatically limit the operating time of fans, lighting fixtures, motors, heating devices, and other electrical loads, this timer facilitates prolonged energy conservation and operational efficiency.

OPERATES WITHOUT ELECTRICITY - The manual timer offers significant energy savings by operating independently of electricity, reducing overall energy consumption and utility costs in residential and commercial settings.

UNIVERSAL EASY INSTALLATION DESIGN - Engineered to fit any standard, single or multi-gang wall switch, this timer offers a hassle-free replacement solution for outdated switches, enhancing both functionality and energy efficiency.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL APPLIANCE CONTROL - Ideal for automating a variety of electrical devices such as fans, lights, heaters, and motors, this timer ensures optimal energy use and provides convenient, automated control over your daily household and commercial tasks.
product_description: The SW12HWK is a single pole, single throw energy saving timer that uses no electricity to operate. Designed to replace any standard wall switch, single or multi-gang, and automatically limit the ON time of fans, lights, motors, heaters and other energy consuming loads. Has a time limit of 12 hours. This unit is supplied with a molded white time dial plate which is designed to fit either toggle or decorator style switch plates; single or multi-gang. No field modifications are required to fit either style switch plate. Wall plate sold separately. An exclusive up front terminal connection with teeter type terminals and an easy press-on knob design ensure quick and easy installation. CSA certified. Resistive (heater): 20 Amp, 125 VAC, 10 Amp 250/277 VAC. Tungsten: 7A 125 VAC. Motor: 1 HP, 125 VAC, 2 HP, 250 VAC. 50/60 Hz.

product_description: This NSi Industries C506H spring-wound timed switch accepts 120/277 VAC input and its SPST output contacts can activate a 20 amp load or 2 hp motor. The timer's twist knob sets time from one minute to six hours with an automatic Off. The single-pole single-throw (SPST) contacts are housed within a single-gang in-wall switch with metal cover plate that is suitable for indoor use and is Underwriter Laboratories (UL) Listed and Canadian Standards Association (CSA) certified for quality assurance. This switch is suitable for controlling lighting and fans. Specifications Switch typeSpring wound timer with twist knobInput power supply120/277 VAC, 50/60 HzOutput contactsSPST contacts, 20 amps load rating, 2 hp motor load ratingOn/off controlOne minute to six hours with auto Off and HoldEnclosureSingle-gang in-wall, indoor use, metal cover plateTerminal wire size range#12 AWG (American wire gauge)Operating temperature range32 to +122 degrees F (0 to +50 degrees C)Standards metUL Listed, CSA certified Automatic switches are used to turn on or off electrical devices and are activated by time, light, and motion. Time activated switches (also known as timers) operate at preset time intervals during a daily or weekly period and can be either mechanical or electronic. Mechanical timers feature a dial with multiple pins to set the on/off time intervals. Electronic timers feature an LCD display and pushbuttons to set the time intervals. Light activated switches (also known as optical or photo) operate when ambient light levels reach preset values, generally measured in foot candles. Motion-activated switches (also known as motion sensors) operate when an electronic field of a preset range is interrupted. These switches can include energy saving logic that uses combinations of time, light, and motion to operate and can include one or more device outlets or circuit contacts. Automatic switches are used to control indoor lights, outdoor lights, appliances, and small equipment motors. NSi Industries manufactures electrical components and sensors, lighting products, and energy management products. The company, founded in 1975, is headquartered in Huntersville, NC.
